import React from "react"; import exportTallyExcel from '../utils/exportTallyExcel'; export default function ReviewPanel({ cart, vehicleName, vehicleNumber, notes, onPrint, onSendWhatsapp, onAddMore }) { const totalCTN = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.entries.reduce((eSum, e) => eSum + (e.ctn || 0), 0), 0); const handleSendWhatsapp = () => { exportTallyExcel(cart); onSendWhatsapp(); }; return (
